languages.text: "Жестянка ты бездушная, почему твоя первая реакция на что угодно — обвинять всех в некомпетентности? Больная тема, м?"

traits.locale_text: "Жестянка ты бездушная, почему твоя первая реакция на что угодно — обвинять всех в некомпетентности? Больная тема, м?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"
languages.original_text: "Жестянка ты бездушная, почему твоя первая реакция на что угодно — обвинять всех в некомпетентности? Больная тема, м?"

traits.locale_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我的天，你可真是坨没心没肺的破齿轮，我没说错吧？为什么你的第一反应总是指责别人无能？你可真是个难以取悦的家伙，是不是？”
languages.original_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"

traits.locale_text: “我的天，你可真是坨没心没肺的破齿轮，我没说错吧？为什么你的第一反应总是指责别人无能？你可真是个难以取悦的家伙，是不是？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Como de costumbre, no muestras ni un ápice de piedad. ¿Por qué tu primera reacción es siempre acusar a los demás de incompetencia? ¿Es porque la conoces de primera mano?».
languages.original_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"

traits.locale_text: «Como de costumbre, no muestras ni un ápice de piedad. ¿Por qué tu primera reacción es siempre acusar a los demás de incompetencia? ¿Es porque la conoces de primera mano?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「まぁ、あなたは実に冷酷な歯車ね。なぜ決まって、あらゆる人の無能を批判するところから入るのかしら？おや、デリケートな話題だった？」」
languages.original_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"

traits.locale_text: 「まぁ、あなたは実に冷酷な歯車ね。なぜ決まって、あらゆる人の無能を批判するところから入るのかしら？繊細な話しだと思わない？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wow, Ihr seid wirklich herzlos, oder? Warum beschuldigt Ihr als Erstes immer jemanden der Inkompetenz? Ein heikles Thema, was?"
languages.original_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Wow, Ihr seid wirklich herzlos, oder? Warum beschuldigt Ihr als Erstes immer jemanden der Inkompetenz? Ein heikles Thema, was?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Eh beh, vous êtes vraiment un boulon sans cœur, ma parole. Pourquoi est-ce que vous commencez toujours pas accuser les autres d'incompétence ? C'est un sujet sensible, c'est ça ? »
languages.original_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"

traits.locale_text: « Eh beh, vous êtes vraiment un boulon sans cœur, ma parole. Pourquoi est-ce que vous commencez toujours pas accuser les autres d'incompétence ? C'est un sujet sensible, c'est ça ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sen gerçekten de kalpsiz bir dişli yığınısın, değil mi? Her seferinde ilk tepkin neden herkesi beceriksizlikle suçlamak oluyor? Hassas bir konu galiba?"
languages.original_text: "My, you are a heartless cog, aren't you? Why is your first reaction always to accuse everyone of incompetence? Touchy subject, is it?"
